name: Rolling Bots - Give me a hand!
name_original: Rolling Bots - Give me a hand!
description:
Made during the Global Game Jam 2020 (January 2020)

Local-4player Cooperative Game :
Roll your spherical Robot head to grab arms and legs.

Wait, these are NOT your limbs! And Player Blue has YOUR arm... What a mess!

Controle your arm and legs attached to your partners robots to help them.
Get help from their lended limbs to grab all the lost parts.
Meet the other robots and make exchanges to get your integrity back.

Need 4 Xbox360 Controllers :

- Left Stick : Move / Roll your Robot.
- Right Stick : Move Camera.
- LB : Temporary Camera View.
- RB : Toggle Camera View.
- X / Y : activate/desactivate the control of your Left / Right arms on other robots.
- A / B : activate/desactivate the control of your Left / Right legs on other robots.
- Right Stick : Move your limbs on the other robots.

Credits:
